Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh have had an up and down tournament so far, with wins against Afghanistan and losses to England, New Zealand, and India.
South Africa began their campaign by setting a World Cup record of 428/5 against Sri Lanka and have also beaten Australia and England strongly.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai.
The game will be broadcasted live on Star Sports Network in multiple languages and on Disney+ Hotstar in India.
